ITEM.SOURCE: ` CHECK NOT xml IS INITIAL. CALL TRANSFORMATION id SOURCE XML xml RESULT data = my_keys.
` CHECK NOT my_keys IS INITIAL. CALL TRANSFORMATION id SOURCE data = my_keys RESULT XML xml.

` DATA wa LIKE LINE OF my_keys. FIELD-SYMBOLS <wa> LIKE LINE OF my_keys.
IF key IN r_system_status. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_status EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_status=>system_status status = key. ENDIF. IF do_exists( key ) IS INITIAL. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_status EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_status=>status_do_not_exists status = key. ENDIF.
READ TABLE my_keys WITH TABLE KEY key = key ASSIGNING <wa>. IF sy-subrc = 0. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_status EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_status=>status_already_added status = key. ELSE. " unexpected but handled wa-key = key. INSERT wa INTO TABLE my_keys. ASSERT sy-subrc = 0. F_HAS_CHANGED = abap_true. ENDIF.
` READ TABLE all_keys WITH TABLE KEY key = key TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS. IF sy-subrc = 0. exists = abap_true. ENDIF.

` IF key IN r_system_status. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_status EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_status=>system_status status = key. ENDIF. IF do_exists( key ) IS INITIAL. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_status EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_status=>status_do_not_exists status = key. ENDIF.
READ TABLE my_keys WITH TABLE KEY key = key TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS. IF sy-subrc <> 0. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_status EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_status=>status_not_define status = key. ENDIF. result = abap_true.

ITEM.SOURCE:
` DATA _st LIKE LINE OF r_system_status.
_st-sign = 'I'. _st-option = 'BT'. _st-low = 'a'. _st-high = 'z'. APPEND _st TO r_system_status. " System Range
SELECT status INTO TABLE all_keys FROM ygplmt_status.
system_keys = all_keys. DELETE system_keys WHERE key NOT IN r_system_status.

ITEM.TEXT: Is the category a system category ?
is Status a valid system status

ITEM.SOURCE:
` IF NOT key IN r_system_status. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_status EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_status=>not_system_status status = key. ENDIF. IF do_exists( key ) IS INITIAL. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_status EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_status=>status_do_not_exists status = key. ENDIF.
READ TABLE system_keys TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS WITH TABLE KEY key = key. IF sy-subrc <> 0. RAISE EXCEPTION TYPE ygpl_mt_cx_status EXPORTING textid = ygpl_mt_cx_status=>not_system_status status = key. ENDIF. result = abap_true.

TYPES.ITEM: BEGIN OF ts_key, key TYPE TD_STATUS, END OF ts_key `
tt_keys TYPE HASHED TABLE OF ts_key WITH UNIQUE KEY KEY `
